peek.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to look quickly at something, or to look at something from behind something else, especially something that you are not supposed to see
peek.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Shut your eyes and donâ€™t peek!
Carefully he peeked through the glass window in the door.
Paula opened the box and peeked inside.
peek.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if something peeks from somewhere, you can just see a small amount of it
peek.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The moon peeked out from behind the clouds.
